txt.en: 'I am shocked you speak so highly of such a crude rock.'
'I do hope to catch something for my meal!'
'I've been here a long time waiting for a good catch!'
'Will you sit a while and fish with me?'
'I wonder if this river is too cold for fish!'
'I heard that there are fishing-holes all over the world!'
'It is a magnificent piece of work!'
'I can stand here for hours just admiring its size.'
'Do you think I could make something even half as impressive?'
'This is nothing compared to what is over in Thorin's Halls.'
